  • メソッド
com.worksap.nlp.sudachi

インタフェース Morpheme


  • public interface Morpheme
    A morpheme.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      int begin()
      Returns the start index of the morpheme.
      java.lang.String dictionaryForm()
      Returns the dictionary form of morpheme.
      int end()
      Returns the offset after the last character of the morpheme.
      int getDictionaryId()
      Returns the ID of the dicitionary containing the morpheme.
      int getWordId()
      Returns the ID of the morpheme.
      boolean isOOV()
      Returns whether the morpheme is out-of-vocabulary (OOV) or not.
      java.lang.String normalizedForm()
      Returns the normalized form of morpheme.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> partOfSpeech()
      Returns the part of speech of the morpheme.
      short partOfSpeechId()
      Returns the ID of part of speech of the morpheme.
      java.lang.String readingForm()
      Returns the reading form of morpheme.
      java.util.List<Morpheme> split(Tokenizer.SplitMode mode)
      Split the morpheme in another splitting mode.
      java.lang.String surface()
      Returns the text of morpheme.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • begin

        int begin()
        Returns the start index of the morpheme. When the input text is normalized, some morphemes have the same start index.
        戻り値:
        the index of first character of the morpheme

      • end

        int end()
        Returns the offset after the last character of the morpheme. When the input text is normalized, some morphemes have the same end index.
        戻り値:
        the offset after the last character of the morpheme

      • surface

        java.lang.String surface()
        Returns the text of morpheme. When the input text is normalized, some morphemes have the same surface.
        戻り値:
        the text of morpheme

      • partOfSpeech

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> partOfSpeech()
        Returns the part of speech of the morpheme.
        戻り値:
        the part of speech of the morpheme

      • partOfSpeechId

        short partOfSpeechId()
        Returns the ID of part of speech of the morpheme.
        戻り値:
        the ID of part of speech of the morpheme

      • dictionaryForm

        java.lang.String dictionaryForm()
        Returns the dictionary form of morpheme. 'Dictionary form' means a word's lemma and '終止形' in Japanese.
        戻り値:
        the dictionary form of morpheme

      • normalizedForm

        java.lang.String normalizedForm()
        Returns the normalized form of morpheme. This method returns the form normalizing inconsistent spellings and inflected forms.
        戻り値:
        the normalized form of morpheme

      • readingForm

        java.lang.String readingForm()
        Returns the reading form of morpheme. This method returns Japanese syllabaries 'フリガナ' in katakana. If the morpheme is OOV, it returns a empty string.
        戻り値:
        the reading form of morpheme.

      • split

        java.util.List<Morpheme> split(Tokenizer.SplitMode mode)
        Split the morpheme in another splitting mode. If mode is the same with using in Tokenizer.tokenize(Tokenizer.SplitMode,String) or no more splitting, this method returns this.
        パラメータ:
        mode - a mode of splitting
        戻り値:
        the list of splitted morphemes
        関連項目:
        Tokenizer.tokenize(Tokenizer.SplitMode,String)

      • isOOV

        boolean isOOV()
        Returns whether the morpheme is out-of-vocabulary (OOV) or not.
        戻り値:
        true if, and only if the morpheme is OOV

      • getWordId

        int getWordId()
        Returns the ID of the morpheme. The IDs change when the dictionaries are updated or the combination of dictionaries changes. If the morpheme is OOV, it returns an undefined value.
        戻り値:
        the word ID

      • getDictionaryId

        int getDictionaryId()
        Returns the ID of the dicitionary containing the morpheme. If the morpheme is in the system dictionary, it returns 0. If the morpheme is OOV, it returns a negative value.
        戻り値:
        the dictionary ID
